Trade/Device Name(s): PATHIAM System with iScan for HER2/neu
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PATHIAM System with iScan and software for HER2/neu digital image analysis as an aid to pathologists in evaluating immunohistochemically stained breast tissue.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as an accessory to the DAKO HercepTest to aid in detection and semi-quantitative measurement of HER2/neu in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded breast tissue for assessment of patients being considered for HERCEPTIN (Trastuzumab) therapy; pathologist must verify agreement with PATHIAM System score.
